messages.content:
Hi, I am Plugin Pal - your WordPress plugin assistant!
 To begin, please describe the plugin you want to create.

I want a cats carousel. Have some cat images preloaded as well as from admin i should be able to add images. It should be large and capture full width, with auto scrolling every 2 seconds as well as manual right left buttons

Got it! Quick question: where should the carousel appear—on the homepage only, or should you be able to place it anywhere on the site? If homepage only, I’ll lock it there; otherwise I’ll make it placeable anywhere.

requirements.name: Cats Carousel
requirements.description: Full-width auto-scrolling cat image carousel with admin-managed images.
requirements.details: Create a full-width, responsive carousel that displays cat images. Bundle a small set of preloaded royalty‑free cat images (default 8) that show immediately on install. Provide a simple admin screen to add new images (upload from media library) and remove existing ones. The carousel auto-advances every 2 seconds and also supports manual navigation via left and right arrow buttons. It loops continuously. Images scale to fill wide layouts while keeping a clean, large visual presence across desktop and mobile. Use the upload order for display sequence, newest added shown at the end.

messages.content: I should be able to palce myself
Perfect—I'll make it something you can insert anywhere on your site. I have everything I need; I’m starting the build now. Please sit tight while the plugin is generated.

requirements.name: Cats Carousel
requirements.description: Full-width auto-scrolling cat image carousel with admin-managed images, placeable anywhere.
requirements.details: Build a full-width, responsive carousel that showcases cat images. Include a small bundled set of preloaded royalty‑free cat images (about 8) visible immediately on install. Provide a simple admin screen to add images from the media library and remove existing ones. The carousel auto-advances every 2 seconds, loops continuously, and includes visible left/right buttons for manual navigation. Images should scale nicely across desktop and mobile while maintaining a large, edge-to-edge presentation. Display order follows upload order (newest at the end). Make the carousel placeable anywhere on the site (e.g., in pages, posts, or templates) so the user can insert it where needed.

messages.content:
I've created your plugin, packaged as a zip, ready to download and install!. Here are some instructions on how to get started with it:
In your WordPress dashboard, go to Plugins → Add New → Upload Plugin, choose the ZIP we provided, click Install Now, then Activate. To manage the images, go to Settings → Cats Carousel, use “Select Images” to add from your Media Library, and remove any you don’t want. Place the carousel anywhere by adding the shortcode [cats_carousel] to a page or post and publish/update.
'''
